resources.string: Are you sure you want to log out?
The PIN you\'ve entered is incorrect
Success - you are not signed in to opencaching.pl

1. Tap 'Start authorization', to allow Emergency GPX to access your account.
2. The opencaching.pl web page will be opened. Sign in, and allow the application to access your account.
3. A PIN number will be shown, which should be copied and pasted into the field below.
4. Tap 'Finish' to complete the authorization.
